title.rendered: His Excellency Yusuf Maitama Tuggar (OON) received in audience the Deputy Prosecutor General of the International Criminal Court (ICC), Mr. Mame Mandiaye Niang

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf Maitama Tuggar (OON) received in audience the Deputy Prosecutor General of the International Criminal Court (ICC), Mr. Mame Mandiaye Niang and his team today 22nd March, 2024.
The visiting Envoy is in the country on a working visit to interface with some top government officials on legal issues.
